DNA Capsules
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Items: DNA Capsules
By Anonymous on Wednesday, January 3, 2001 - 05:22 pm:

I know what all the DNA capsules give you if you use them as secret seasonings while combining.
Pink: GentleMocchi
Black: ForawrdGolem
Gray: Moo
White: White Mocchi
Gold/Green: Gold Suezo
Yellow: Mia
Red: Poison

This list probably won't help anybody, but it might make it so you people know what you would get if you use the DNA capsules. And they actually work, no freezing or anything.
By:

GhoulShine

By Carl Carlisle on Friday, January 12, 2001 - 12:15 pm:

?DNA Capsules?

By Kurasu Soratobu on Friday, January 12, 2001 - 01:40 pm:

They're an item from the Pocketstation game, Carl. They are unavailable in the US, unless you have both a copy of Monster Farm II, and a Pocketstation. They are, as Ghpoulshine mentioned, used for breeding rare (/???) monsters.

You can also use a Gameshark to get them. And I'm considering it, just so I can breed a Gentlemocchi. I want all the cards!
